inclusions.title: Pre-existing diseases (PED)
inclusions.description: Covered from Day one.

inclusions.title: Ailment capping
inclusions.description: Appendectomy, cataract, Hernia, Hydrocele, Hysterectomy - 10% of sum insured upto ₹30,000. Kidney Stone & Prostate Removal surgery and any problems or complications related to it & Gall stone - 10% of the sum insured upto ₹30,000. Piles - 10% of the sum insured subject upto ₹30,000. Joint Replacement - 15% of the sum insured upto ₹45,000

inclusions.title: No co-pay
inclusions.description: 0% co-pay

inclusions.title: Pre-hospitalisation
inclusions.description: 30 days of pre-hospitalisation is covered

inclusions.title: Post-hospitalisation
inclusions.description: 60 days of post-hospitalisation is covered

inclusions.title: Ambulance cover
inclusions.description: Ambulance coverage of up to ₹2000 per incidence

inclusions.title: Day care procedures
inclusions.description: Covered for specific procedures as per list which require less than 24 hrs of hospitalization

inclusions.title: Room rent charges
inclusions.description: Room rent charges for twin sharing including RMO, nursing charges and other associated charges are covered upto 2% of sum insured for normal hospitalization and upto 4% for ICUs.

inclusions.title: Maternity cover
inclusions.description: Maternity cover for normal delivery and C-section delivery up to ₹40,000 each are covered. No waiting period applicable for maternity benefits.

inclusions.title: New born baby cover
inclusions.description: New born baby coverage will be active from day 1 upto maternity limits

inclusions.title: Accidental death
inclusions.description: Cover up to personal accident sum insured of ₹5,00,000

inclusions.title: Permanent partial disability (PPD)
inclusions.description: PPD cover up to ₹5,00,000 is covered

inclusions.title: Permanent total disability (PTD)
inclusions.description: PTD cover up to ₹5,00,000 is covered

inclusions.title: Daily Hospitalization cash benefits
inclusions.description: Daily cash of ₹500/day up to 15 days is covered on hospitalization with a 1 day deductible.

inclusions.title: Ayush Treatment
inclusions.description: Medical expenses which are incurred on treatment under AYUSH up to the sum insured will be indemnified.

inclusions.title: Temporary Total Disablement (TTD)
inclusions.description: TTD cover up to ₹500/day for a maximum of 10 days is provided.

inclusions.title: Medical Expenses (ME)
inclusions.description: Covers hospitalization or in-patient care due to injury, based on doctor's advice. Limit: Up to ₹5,000 or actual cost, whichever is lower.

inclusions.title: Carriage of Dead Body
inclusions.description: Covers transportation of the deceased to their residence if death occurs due to an accident outside home. Limit: 2% of Capital Sum Insured or ₹5,000, whichever is less.

inclusions.title: Modern Treatment Cover
inclusions.description: Up to 50% of Base Sum Insured for advanced procedures like stem cell therapy, oral chemo, robot surgeries, immunotherapy, laser treatments, and neuro monitoring.

inclusions.title: Organ Donor Cover
inclusions.description: Covers up to 50% of base sum insured for medical expenses of organ transplant (for the insured person only). Note: Donor's surgery cost & other expenses not covered.

inclusions.title: In-Patient Treatment Cover
inclusions.description: Medical expenses covered during hospital stays on doctor's advice, including room rent, nursing, doctor fees, OT charges, anesthesia, oxygen, surgical items, medicines, drugs, and consumables.

exclusions.title: Diagnosis and evaluation
exclusions.description: Expenses related to any admission intended for diagnostic and evaluation purposes.

exclusions.title: Gender change treatments
exclusions.description: Expenses related to any treatment pertaining to gender change not covered

exclusions.title: Cosmetic or plastic surgery
exclusions.description: Not covered unless related to reconstruction following an accident, burns or cancer

exclusions.title: Dental treatments
exclusions.description: Dental treatments not covered except in cases of accidents

exclusions.title: Consumables
exclusions.description: Consumables such as syringes, medications and more not covered

exclusions.title: Games and adventure sports
exclusions.description: Injuries, hospitalizations or other claims arising from games or adventure sports not covered

exclusions.title: Suicide or self-harm
exclusions.description: Claims arising from suicide, injuries/attempts to suicide or self-harm not covered

exclusions.title: Criminal acts
exclusions.description: Claims related to violation of law with criminal intent not covered

exclusions.title: War or terrorism
exclusions.description: Acts of terrorism or war not covered

exclusions.title: Mental and sexual health
exclusions.description: Claims related to STDs and mental health not covered

exclusions.title: Substance abuse and self-harm under influence
exclusions.description: Treatment for alcohol, drugs or substance abuse, or any addictive condition - including self-inflicted injury, suicide or attempted suicide under the influence of alcohol or drugs - not covered.

exclusions.title: Infertility or sterility related expenses
exclusions.description: Expenses related to infertility or sterility treatments are not covered.

claims.title: How to raise a claim?
claims.manager: For claims related queries, please reach out to your claims manager

planned.title: Planned Cashless Claim
planned.description: Choose this option if you have plans to receive treatment at a hospital in the upcoming days.

emergency.title: Emergency Cashless Claim
emergency.description: Choose this option if you are currently at the hospital and receiving medical care.

reimbursement.title: Reimbursement Claim
reimbursement.description: Select this if you have recently been released from the hospital and settled any outstanding medical expenses.

login.credentials: Enter your credentials to access your account
login.hint: Hint: Use demo@example.com / password to login

errors.noPolicy: No policy exists for your registered mobile number. Please contact us to know more.

notFound.message: Oops! We couldn't find the page you're looking for.
